articles.title: Kim Jong Il Guides Creation of Opera
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Guides Creation of Opera
Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il guided the creation of opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai."
					 After acquainting himself with the progress made in the creation of the opera, he appreciated it.
					
					 The opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai" adapted from a famous folk legend, one of the Chinese typical tragedies, makes a truthful artistic representation of the unreasonable status system in feudal China through the tragic love between Zhu Yingtai, the only daughter of an influential family, and Liang Shanbo, a son of an ordinary literary man's family. 
					
					 After watching the opera, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the creators and artistes have successfully completed a peculiar opera fully meeting the need of the original work by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm. He highly appreciated their creative success and efforts made by them. 
					
					 The young artistes, in particular, who performed in the opera are very high in their artistry, he said, adding that this is a clear demonstration of the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy on training reserve artistes.
					
					 He said that the Korean people having such world-famous cultural treasures as the five revolutionary operas and advancing with pride toward the world should know better about the world culture, too.
					
					 Underlining the need to round off on the highest level the opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai," a classical work of China, which exposed the contradictions in the unethical class society, and show it to the Korean people as it is still instructive, he set forth specified tasks and ways to do so. 
					
					 It is the firm stand of the WPK and people of the DPRK to further consolidate and develop generation after generation the precious DPRK-China friendship provided by President Kim Il Sung and the leaders of the elder generation of China for a long period, he noted, stressing that cultural exchange plays an important role in boosting the friendship between the two peoples.
					
					 He was accompanied by Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, and other leading officials of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Red Cross Working Contact Made
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Red Cross Working Contact Made
						
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The second round of the inter-Korean Red Cross working contact for the reunion of separated families and relatives was made in Kaesong Friday.
					 At the contact the DPRK side proposed discussing the issue of the scope of the reunion of separated families and relatives and its venue which were left unsettled at the last contact and adopting an agreement on the inter-Korean Red Cross working contact.
					
					 It also proposed with sincerity to open the north-south Red Cross full-dress talks in the middle of October as regards the issue of reunion raised by the south side and discuss there such humanitarian issues as putting the reunion on a normal footing. 
					
					 Taking into consideration the south side's proposal for choosing the Mt. Kumgang Reunion Center as the venue of the reunion, the DPRK side had a sincere consultation on it as a separate issue by getting its officials concerned involved at the contact. 
					
					 But, the south side, which had been reluctant to have the said working contact from the outset, took an insincere attitude toward the contact. It overturned all the agreed points, including the date of reunion and the date of exchange of lists of persons to be involved in the reunion, on which both sides agreed upon at the last contact, proposing to delay them. It also insisted that it was possible to adopt an agreement unless the issue of the venue of the reunion is settled. 
					
					 When the DPRK side proposed discussing the said issue between those persons concerned of both sides, accepting the south side's proposal with magnanimity, the south side immediately withdrew its assertion about the venue of the reunion and proposed changing it. It thus deliberately threw another hurdle in the way of discussing the issues.
					
					   The south side, while delaying the talks for hours over the issue of the venue, took such a very rude attitude as saying that it would unilaterally withdraw from the contact though it has not yet been concluded.
					
					 Due to the wrong stand of the south side, the two sides at the contact failed to properly consult any issue regarding the date of the reunion, its scope and venue, ending up without adopting any agreement.
					
					 The south side insincerely approached the contact without preparing any keynote speech and making preparations for an agreement. When the DPRK side chided this behavior, the south side took such an impolite attitude as putting forward the roughly prepared speech it had used at the previous round of the contact, leaving the date and words untouched.
					
					 The current round of the contact clearly revealed that "humanitarianism" and the pain of the "separated families" about which the south side has so far talked a great deal are nothing but sheer lies and it has no will to substantially solve the issue.
					
					 The DPRK side took a serious note of this and urged the south side to honestly approach the discussion on the issue.
					
					 Both sides decided to further the contact between those related to the authorities and the Red-Cross working contact on the issue of the venue of the reunion in Kaesong on Oct. 1.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Yemeni President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Yemeni President
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Yemeni President Ali Abdullah Saleh on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of the September 26 revolution of the  Yemeni people.
					Kim in the message sincerely wished the President and people of Yemen greater success in their work to protect the gains of the revolution and achieve the country's stability and prosperity.

articles.title: Talks between Judicial Delegations of DPRK and China Held
articles.content:
Talks between Judicial Delegations of DPRK and China Held
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Talks between the delegation of the DPRK Supreme Court and the Chinese judicial delegation were held here on Saturday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the delegation headed by First Vice-President of the Supreme Court Kang Sok Ju and from the Chinese side members of the delegation led by Vice-Minister of Justice Zhang Sujun and Miao Weicheng, councilor of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the matter of developing cooperation between the two countries in the field of justice and issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese Culture Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese Culture Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting Chinese delegation of officials for culture.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Saturday by Dong Junsin, director of the Department for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries of the Ministry of Culture of China who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: North Hwanghae Provincial People's Study House Completed
articles.content:
North Hwanghae Provincial People's Study House Completed
Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The North Hwanghae Provincial People's Study House has been successfully completed.
					 Built in Sariwon City, the study house has a floor space of at least 4,500 square meters. 
					
					 Catalogue browsing, book and information reading, lectures, etc.  are provided by a computer network.
					
					 The study house will make a positive contribution to disseminating science and technology and cultural knowledge among the people. 
					
					 A ceremony for the completion of the study house took place on Saturday.

articles.title: Sariwon Zoo Rebuilt
articles.content:
Sariwon Zoo Rebuilt
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Sariwon Zoo in North Hwanghae Province opened to visitors with due ceremony on Saturday.
					 The zoo, placed at the foot of picturesque Mt. Kyongam, has nearly 20 animal sheds including those of tiger, monkey, bear, parrot and reptile and aquarium as well as playgrounds for animals, souvenir shop and auxiliary buildings.
					
					 The wonderfully face-lifted zoo will make a positive contribution to the people's entertainment.

articles.title: New Agricultural Scientific and Technological Books Published
articles.content:
New Agricultural Scientific and Technological Books Published
						
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) --More than 30 new agricultural scientific and technological books were published in the DPRK.
					 Among them are books "Sparse Planting Culture of Paddy Rice" and "Method of Experimenting on Crop Cultivation."
					
					 The books explain in plain language the physiological character of paddy rice for sparse planting culture, specific cultivating technology and principle and method of experimenting on the crop cultivation. 
					
					 The book "Reference for Maize Farming" deals with scientific and technological problems arising in all the processes of maize cultivation. 
					
					 There are also books dealing with cultivation technology and methods suitable for bean cultivation as an after crop and potato farming in respective areas.
					
					 Among the new books are books helpful to placing the breeding and management of domestic animals, their propagation and anti-epizootic work on a scientific and technological basis. 
					
					 They include books helpful to raising the level of scientific and technological knowledge of officials and other working people in the field of agriculture.

articles.title: State Merited Chorus Performs in Sinuiju
articles.content:
State Merited Chorus Performs in Sinuiju 
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus gave performances at the North Phyongan Provincial Art Theatre on Sept. 23 and 24.
					 The performances were appreciated by officials of party and power organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments and farms and people from all walks of life in the province.
					
					 It put on the stage such numbers as male chorus "General of Korea", orchestra and male chorus "The Forest Sways", male choruses "Road of Victory" and "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party", male solo and chorus "For My Only Motherland" and male chorus "Push Back the Frontiers of the Latest Science and Technology".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il who has brought about a stirring era of the building of a thriving socialist nation on this land, holding high the banner of Songun, and impressively represented the revolutionary spirit of the Korean people effecting great innovations and leap forward in production and construction.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Pushing Back Frontiers of Science and Technology
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Pushing Back Frontiers of Science and Technology
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Light comedy "Echo of Mountain", winner of Kim Il Sung prize, had been staged in different parts of the country till late in September since it raised its curtain in Pyongyang in April, immensely encouraging the people in our era.
					 The light comedy, another monumental masterpiece representing the Songun era, aroused the Korean people to the drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The officials and people in all fields of the national economy in the DPRK waged a high-pitched drive to push back the frontiers of the latest science and technology amid the hot wind raised by the light comedy sweeping across the country. In this course they prepared valuable gifts to be presented to the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea and the WPK conference to be specially recorded in the history of the country.
					
					 The workers of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex pushed back the frontiers of the latest science and technology in the field of metallurgical industry, keeping the production of Juche iron going at a high rate.
					
					Achievements were made in the construction site of the Huichon Power Station and the Taegyedo Tideland covering 8,800 hectares was reclaimed on the west coast.
					
					 The Songun Foundry and the Songun Compressor Shop were newly built on the basis of modern science and technology at the Ryongsong Machine Complex, bringing about a fresh turn in casting irons and producing compressors. The workers of the Chollima Steel Complex completed the UHP electric arc furnace No. 2 earlier than scheduled while those of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex manufactured a new type electric locomotive based on cutting-edge technology by waging the high-pitched drive for effecting a great surge. Achievements were also reported from other fields amid the "Echo of Mountain".
					
					 A great many monumental edifices in the era of great surge sprang up and power bases were completed in different parts of the country.
					
					 A nine-axis turning machining centre, the latest CNC-based machine tool, was successfully manufactured to lay a firm foundation for rapidly developing the nation's industry as a whole including ship-building industry and space and air industries.
					
					 A high-pitched drive was waged in the fields of agriculture and light industry, too, to bring about a great surge. 
					
					At least 3,000 valuable inventions and new technological achievements have been made in the course of young people's nationwide march for developing science and technology.
					
					 The on-going grand march, an embodiment of the work style taught by the light comedy, once again proves that the DPRK will tower high in the world by pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology in all fields.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for
Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- It is an irresistible desire of the fellow countrymen and their unanimous will to support and uphold the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration and implement them.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The said declarations have commanded unquestioned support from all Koreans irrespective of ideology and ism and been accepted by them as a reunification programme common to the nation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Their spirit represents the strong faith of Koreans which can never be quelled by any moves against reunification.
					
					 "Long live the struggle to achieve reunification and peace in the spirit of by our nation itself!" loudly chanted by Rev. Han Sang Ryol when crossing the Panmunjom demarcation line dividing Korea into the north and the south after visiting Pyongyang reflected the irresistible desire for reunification.
					
					 Progressive organizations representing people of different strata including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea and the (south) Korean Confederation of Trade Unions strongly urged the authorities to make an immediate switchover in their anachronistic policy of confrontation and save the inter-Korean relations from the worst phase as early as possible.
					
					 Actions gaining momentum in south Korea to support Rev. Han's righteous visit to Pyongyang and demand his release clearly show the ardent desire of south Koreans to defend peace and achieve reconciliation, unity and independent reunification of the nation through the implementation of the above-said declarations.
					
					 Aware that it is possible to protect independence and dignity of the nation and achieve peace, prosperity and reunification only when the June 15 cause is upheld and dynamically pushed forward, all the fellow countrymen are resolutely turning out as one in the patriotic struggle for preserving and implementing the above-said declarations, concludes the article.

articles.title: Withdrawal of US Troops from S. Korea Demanded in Nepal
articles.content:
Withdrawal of US Troops from S. Korea Demanded in Nepal
Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Nepal-Korea Friendship Association and the Nepalese Committee for Supporting the Reunification of Korea made public a joint statement on Sept. 22 in denunciation of the U.S. troops' presence in south Korea.
					 The statement said that the U.S. troops' presence in south Korea is the root cause of disturbing the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and keeping the Korean people, a homogenous nation, divided. It refers in detail to its illegality. 
					
					 The statement recalled that since their shameful defeat in the Korean War the U.S. imperialists have massively shipped military equipment including nukes into south Korea and worked hard to perpetuate their forces' presence in south Korea. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. troops' presence in south Korea is the root cause of the division of the Korean nation that lasted for more than half a century. It is not only a threat to peace on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and, furthermore, the world but a challenge to the fair conscience of the world and international law. 
					
					The Nepal-Korea Friendship Association and the Nepalese Committee for Supporting the Reunification of Korea strongly demand the U.S. troops immediately pull out of south Korea to ensure peace and stability on the peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and the world.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Celebrated in Russia and Mexico
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Celebrated in Russia and Mexico
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- An opening ceremony of a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition and a film show were held in Russia and a lecture took place in Mexico on Sept. 17 and 18 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photos on their exploits, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The representative of the Maritime Territorial Administration of Russia and several personages in their speeches at the opening ceremony said that the Songun idea and the Songun politics whose might and validity are clearly proved serve as a banner of struggle of all the countries and nations struggling for independence. 
					
					 The mayor of a city of Mexico said in the lecture that the Workers' Party of Korea has covered a path of victory and glory for 65 years, adding that the Korean people have achieved big successes in socialist construction while protecting the country and nation's sovereignty and dignity thanks to the correct leadership of the WPK. 
					
					 He wished the Korean people bigger successes in their drive for building a thriving nation and the country's reunification under the experienced and seasoned guidance of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre la delegacion del TSC y la judicial de China
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre la delegacion del TSC y la judicial de China 
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 25 en esta capital las conversaciones entre la delegacion del Tribunal Supremo de Corea (TSC) y la delegacion judicial de China.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los miembros de la delegacion del TSC encabezada por el primer vicepresidente Kang Sok Ju, los miembros de la delegacion judicial de China presidida por el viceministro de Justicia Zhang Sujun y el consejero de la embajada china en Corea Miao Weicheng.
					
					  Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el problema de desarrollar la cooperacion entres los dos paises en la rama de justicia y otros asuntos de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Consejo de Ministros ofrece banquete en honor de participantes en festival
articles.content:
Consejo de Ministros ofrece banquete en honor de participantes en festival
						
  Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 24 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo un banquete en honor de los participantes en el XII Festival Internacional de Cine de Pyongyang en relacion con que este certamen tuvo lugar con exito. 
					Fueron invitados las delegaciones y delegados de Corea y otros paises y de coreanos en ultramar y los miembros del jurado internacional.
					
					Estuvieron presentes el vicepremier Kang Nung Su, el presidente del Comite Estatal de Cine y del comite organizador del festival, Hong Kwang Sun, y otros funcionarios, los creadores y artistas de la rama cinematografica.
					
					  En su discurso, Kang Nung Su se refirio a la realizacion fructifera del presente festival y apunto que las actividades de los participantes en esta ocasion contribuiran a la cooperacion estrecha y al avance conjunto con vistas al desarrollo del cine nacional.

articles.title: Coro Estatal Benemerito ofrece funcion en Sinuiju
articles.content:
Coro Estatal Benemerito ofrece funcion en Sinuiju
						
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Coro Estatal Benemerito actuo los dias 23 y 24 en el Teatro de Arte de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					Presenciaron el espectaculo los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y el poder, organizaciones de masas, fabricas, empresas y granjas y los trabajadores de distintos sectores de esa provincia.
					
					En la escena se pusieron el coro masculino "General de Corea", la musica orquestal y coro masculino "Se agita el bosque", el coro masculino "El camino de victoria", "!Que prospere la epoca del Partido del Trabajo", el solo y coro masculinos "Por la unica Patria", el coro masculino "Que conquisten la cumbre de la tecnologia de punta" y otras piezas.
					
					En la funcion los ejecutantes elogiaron mucho las hazanas inmortales realizadas por el Dirigente     Kim Jong Il en su guia mediante el Songun.
					
					El trajo la epoca conmovedora de la construccion de una gran potencia prospera socialista sobre el suelo patrio levantando en alto la bandera del Songun.
					
					Igualmente, los artistas demostraron de modo impresionante el impetu revolucionario del pueblo coreano que crea grandes innovaciones y gran auge en la produccion y la construccion.

articles.title: Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo de provincia de Hwanghae del Norte
articles.content:
Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo de provincia de Hwanghae del Norte 
						
  Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 25 el acto inaugural del Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo de la Provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					  Este palacio construido nuevamente en la ciudad de Sariwon tiene una dimension arquitectonica de mas de 4 mil 500 metros cuadrados.
					
					La busqueda de catalogos, la lectura de libros y datos y las lecciones se realizan con las computadoras y el network.
					
					  Este palacio-biblioteca contribuira activamente a la divulgacion a los habitantes de los conocimientos cientifico-tecnicos y culturales.
